name: FolderEncrypted
short_description: It has become common place to use compressed formats to bunch files and folders together to transport and store. The Zip format works great for the everyday user, but up till now Encryption has been something that only some have been able to master. This project is here to close that gap. The end user needs to be able to protect his/her sensitive data. FolderEncrypted will only allow people be able to read sensitive data if they can provide the encryption key, but once the correct key is entered they can read and write to the file freely.
summary: Create and manipulate Encrypted Folders as easaly as Zip folders
